ngTableDefaultGetDataProvider

Allows for the configuration of the ngTableDefaultGetData service.

Set filterFilterName to the name of a angular filter that knows how to take NgTableParams.filter() to restrict an array of data.

Set sortingFilterName to the name of a angular filter that knows how to take NgTableParams.orderBy() to sort an array of data.

Out of the box the ngTableDefaultGetData service will be configured to use the angular filter and orderBy filters respectively
